history.narrative: Law 19-22, the “Athletic Concussion Protection Act of 2011”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-7, which was referred to the Committee on Health. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 7, 2011, and July 12, 2011, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 27, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 19-99 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-22 became effective on October 20, 2011.
